entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Whale Cove
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 2:19 PM CST Thursday 26 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -35.7°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Whale Cove Airport 10:00 PM CST Thursday 26 January 2023
Temperature: -35.7°C
Pressure: 100.9 kPa
Humidity: 67 %
Wind Chill: -50
Dewpoint: -39.6°C
Wind: NW 19 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of light snow. Low minus 43. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy with 30 percent chance of light snow early this evening. Clearing this evening. Wind northwest 30 km/h. Low minus 43. Wind chill minus 52 this evening and minus 60 overnight. Hazardous frostbite conditions. Forecast issued 3:00 PM CST Thursday 26 January 2023

entry.title: Friday: Mainly sunny. High minus 39.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Wind north 20 km/h. High minus 39. Wind chill minus 60 in the morning and minus 54 in the afternoon. Hazardous frostbite conditions. Forecast issued 3:00 PM CST Thursday 26 January 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Blowing snow. Temperature rising to minus 32 by morning.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Blowing snow overnight. Wind north 20 km/h becoming northwest 40 gusting to 60 near midnight. Temperature rising to minus 32 by morning. Wind chill minus 56 in the evening and minus 50 overnight. Hazardous frostbite conditions. Forecast issued 3:00 PM CST Thursday 26 January 2023
